attributes.action: For more support for Hidden disability job seekers from job centres
attributes.additional_details: Many people with Dyslexia,Dyspraxia, ADHD and other hidden disabilities are over looked in job centres, there is little help for these people who want to work,  but they  only get offered lower paid low skilled jobs, though many can achieve more and have higher IQ's and feel insulted just because of lack of knowledge on the job centres part, the reason they get these offered is because they have trouble reading, writing or poor interview skills.  Please help retrain Job Centres to help these people as they are being under mind because of a disability.
